subject: Golf
Celebrities
lead_paragraph: What started with a small group of Bing Crosby’s pals at the Crosby Clambake in 1937 turned into a 50-year run for celebrity-branded pro-ams, and the Bob Hope Chrysler Classic is lone surviver.
